quotes.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If A is success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Try not to become a man of success but rather to become a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A great secret of success is to go through life as a man who never gets used up.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: A discovery is said to be an accident meeting a prepared mind.
quotes.author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quotes.quote: To follow, without halt, one aim: There's the secret of success.
quotes.author: Anna Pavlova

quotes.quote: If your success is not on your own terms, if it looks good to the world but does not feel good in your heart, it is not success at all.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Success is the necessary misfortune of life, but it is only to the very unfortunate that it comes early.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: It is possible to fail in many ways...while to succeed is possible only in one way.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Of course there is no formula for success except perhaps an unconditional acceptance of life and what it brings.
quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein

quotes.quote: Find somebody to be successful for. Raise their hopes. Think of their needs.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: I've come to embrace the notion that I haven't done enough in my life. I've come to confirm that one's title, even a title like president of the United States, says very little about how well one's life has been led. No matter how much you've done or how successful you've been, there's always more to do, always more to learn, and always more to achieve.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: That's what building a body of work is all about. It's about the daily labor, the many individual acts, the choices large and small that add up over time, over a lifetime to a lasting legacy. It's about not being satisfied with the latest achievement, the latest gold star, because the one thing I know about a body of work is that it's never finished. It's cumulative. It deepens and expands with each day you give your best. You may have setbacks and you may have failures, but you're not done. You haven't even started.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The leaders we revere and the businesses that last are generally not the result of a narrow pursuit of popularity or personal advancement, but of devotion to some bigger purpose. That's the hallmark of real success. The other trapping of success might be the by product of this larger mission, but it can't be the central thing.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Why be a man when you can be a success?
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everybody.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who see his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.
quotes.author: Cecil B. DeMille

quotes.quote: Nothing succeeds like the appearance of success.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: There is only one success - to be able to spend your life in your own way.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: There is only one success... to be able to spend your life in your own way, and not to give others absurd maddening claims upon it.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: The man of virtue makes the difficulty to be overcome his first business, and success only a subsequent consideration.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Real success is finding your lifework in the work that you love.
quotes.author: David McCullough

quotes.quote: Envy was just the tax you paid on success.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Success in business requires training and discipline and hard work. But if you're not frightened by these things, the opportunities are just as great today as they ever were.
quotes.author: Dr. David M. Burns

quotes.quote: Aim for success, not perfection. Never give up your right to be wrong, because then you will lose the ability to learn new things and move forward with your life.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: We succeed only as we identify in life, or in war, or in anything else, a single overriding objective, and make all other considerations bend to that one objective.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: When I was younger I thought success was something different. I thought, " When I grow up, I want to be famous. I want to be a star. I want to be in movies. When I grow up I want to see the world, drive nice cars. I want to have groupies." But my idea of success is different today. For me, the most important thing in your life is to live your life with integrity and not to give into peer pressure, to try to be something that you're not. To live your life as an honest and compassionate person. To contribute in some way.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Success is counted sweetest by those who ne'er succeed.
